name: Code Lyoko: Quest for Infinity
description: With an emphasis on team interaction, puzzle solving, exploration and intense combat, Code Lyoko: Quest for Infinity will provide an exciting gaming experience for players of all ages. Fight, explore, drive and hack your way to victory in this action packed RPG adventure in the digital realm! Carry out spectacular actions with the Wii pad and use it to explore new ways of controlling your character and environment!
